r.d: Mailparse is an extension for parsing and working with email messages. It can deal with rfc822 and rfc2045 (MIME) compliant messages.
r.n: fix buffer overflow/segfault problem seen on windows (shire) PHP-5.3 compatability (pierre) Remove compile time warnings, regenerate re2c file, fix old re2c file typo (shire) Fix memory leak in mailparse_mimemessage creation (shire) Fix bug #1462 (shire)
